post:
MyRSK webhosting solutions has entered the budget vps market since ~12 months (globally). However, we have been providing webhosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies. We are currently holding strong with many, many happy clients :-)

The following plan is an offer from our newest location and technology; KVM in the UK.

**To get the double RAM, just open a ticket after ordering and you will get it :)**

> 512KVM
512MB RAM Guaranteed - **get it doubled to 1024MB for FREE!**
20GB HD
500GB BW @ 100mb/s
1 ipv4 
$7/month (originally $10)
Use Coupon: LET-X2YNDI0D5X
FREE Addons Pack (10GB backup space + hosted DNS!)
Order: http://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=50

Limited stock, VPS is delivered with RescueCD by default, you have option to use KVMTemplates to reinstall, or provide us your own iso!

**Free Addons Pack : Get 10GB of space + DNS (more info on the plans page)**

**DirectAdmin License available : $5/month**

**5 days money back guarantee, no BS :)**

Test IP: 94.229.73.114

For queries or support please submit a ticket : http://myrsk.com/whmcs/submitticket.php

Website : http://myrsk.com/

Regards,
R. Alkhaili
